mono.p: The tide rises, the tide falls. [\s]The tide rises, the tide falls. [\s]
The tide rises, the tide falls. [\s]The tide rises, the tide falls.
Before the eyes, is a boundless library of knowledge. [\s]
The vast information contained within, cannot be comprehended by mere mortals.
The tide rises, the tide falls.
Waves of information brushed against the man’s consciousness, again and again, again and again. [\s]
He tried his best to remain clear-headed.
Within the sea, limitless amounts of information floated and sank.
What the man could grasp, were but mere planktons.
And among the information obtained by hand, there was very little usable; [\s]
If he didn’t meticulously and carefully pick the right data,
how was it different from a fool to sit on infinite knowledge?
And so he continued to search.
In a place that tends to be unknown, the opponent he once defeated, the deity of "Void Archives,” still covets his physical body.
Infinite knowledge was its bait, and generous gifts are its weapons.
The man knew that "it" was waiting, waiting for his guard to slip.
But he was still searching.
The search will not stop.
All this was to save that person——
For this, does hard work mean anything? [\s]
Does danger mean anything? [\s]
Does time mean anything?
Eternity… Does it mean anything?
The tide rises, the tide falls. [\s]The tide rises, the tide falls. [\s]
The tide rises, the tide falls. [\s]The tide rises, the tide falls.
The will of the man never wavered.
The tide rises——
He was still searching.
